squidpony.squidgrid.shape

Class TiledShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.shape.TiledShape

  • @Beta
public class TiledShape
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a generic shape for tile map generation. The toString() method simply prints out the first character in the string of each cell.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Builds a tiled shape based on the pixel colors of the image passed in.

      Builds a tiled shape with the given dimensions and all empty spaces.

      Builds a tiled shape based on the structure of a provided shape.
      TiledShape(java.lang.String[][] template)
      Builds the tiled shape directly from the provided template.
      TiledShape(TiledShape other)
      Creates a new tiled shape and deep copies the template.

        public TiledShape(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Builds a tiled shape based on the pixel colors of the image passed in. Values are stored as the ARGB values in hex code.
        Parameters:

      • overwrite

        public void overwrite(TiledShape other,
             int xOffset,
             int yOffset)
        Overwrites this TiledShape at the given offset with the information in the provided TiledShape in the area where the two shapes overlap. Negative offsets are allowed.
        Parameters:
        other -
        xOffset -
        yOffset -

      • deteriorate

        public void deteriorate(double deteriorationChance,
               java.lang.String deteriorationString)
        Deteriorates the given TiledShape on a per-cell random chance. If a cell is selected to be deteriorated, it's value is set to the provided string. Changes are made directly to the provided shape.
        Parameters:
        deteriorationChance - the chance for each fillable space to be filled
        deteriorationString -
